siteMetadata.title: Dylan Fox
siteMetadata.description: Dylan Fox's online portfolio where he showcases his work and writs articles of topics he is interested in.
siteMetadata.author: Dylan Fox
siteMetadata.bio: Dylan works as a developer for Evolytics, a Concord Company. He has degrees in Computer Science and Mathematics and is pursuing a Master's in Data Science. He enjoys playing soccer, running scenic trails, and JavaScript programming.
